title: Pure Watchface
summary: So simple, pure and colourful watch face!
description: Transform your smart watch to look more pure than ever!It has a simple design with awesome colour themes.•Pure dark•Pure pink•Pure purple•Pure deep purple•Pure indigo•Pure teal•Pure green•Pure yellowIt is made in such a way that it doesn't consume much battery and resources.It just shows what info is needed with small owner information.This watch face will receive updates with required amount of features to keep your watch in an optimized way. Keep calm and purify your smartwatch!Works well with square and round (also Moto 360 ) smartwatches!
descriptionHTML:
Transform your smart watch to look more pure than ever!

It has a simple design with awesome colour themes.

•Pure dark
•Pure pink
•Pure purple
•Pure deep purple
•Pure indigo
•Pure teal
•Pure green
•Pure yellow

It is made in such a way that it doesn't consume much battery and resources.
It just shows what info is needed with small owner information.

This watch face will receive updates with required amount of features to keep your watch in an optimized way. Keep calm and purify your smartwatch!

Works well with square and round (also Moto 360 ) smartwatches!
